name: Colorjamz.github.io
tagline: Support web site for ColorJamz iPad app
body:
ColorJamz is the first of its kind. Load it up and fill the squares on the grid with notes and chords using the colorful keyboard. Draw paths over these squares to create melodies and musical lines with ease.

Please send questions, comments and concerns to colorjamzapp@gmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
